author: andschwa
body: And fix warning introduced by a494516c5de90007a169927472f70e04781bf72e.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
oh that would be lovely.
I was hoping you would fix it legitimately ;)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors The warnings produced by compiling MMIN on FullCLR are legitimate; the stub uses types that are stubbed on CoreCLR but exist on FullCLR. However, MMIN will eventually disappear for FullCLR, and instead it will actually the _real_, managed C++ version of MMIN (from @fearthecowboy when he gets the time).

comments.author: vors
comments.body: "Replacing MMIN" is what I mean by legitimately :D

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: That day is sadly not here yet.

title: Treat C# warnings as errors
